channel.title: My introduction/question
channel.description: Hello there, my shane is shimpo, you can call me shane though. New to this forum but have been using it on and off for years now. I play a few rsps servers aswell as runescape, Im looking to create and run my own rsps I have a mass amount of people that would join said rsps if im too make one. These are players from other servers and real life friends that would join, also alot of people and websites to advertise, Im not so good at making rsps so if anyone wants to help me with this it would be much appericiated. there will be payment if someone can help me threw the entire process and do it well, also if they want they can co-own the server with myself and any donation rewards will be 50/50. If i own my own server i can almost be certain it will be successful ( i hope ) if anyone can help me Private message me or email me @ Shane-blue@hotmail.com thanks all

item.title: My introduction/question
item.dc:creator: @Hot_Potato1 Hot_Potato
item.description:
@Hot_Potato1 wrote:

How could the server be successful if you’re not good in Java?

item.title: My introduction/question
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:439475”]1. Welcome to Moparscape
2. Look out for “dem mods” they like to infract!
3. Sadly this is not the place to make a server development team. That would be a few boards down.
4. I think that about gathers it up…[/quote]
5. You want to watch out for the trolls
6. Try not to misspell things and use proper grammar, that’s what trolls feed on.
7. Enjoy your stay
8. I think that about wraps it up.

Read full topic

item.title: My introduction/question
item.dc:creator: @Shimpo Shimpo
item.description:
@Shimpo wrote:

Hello there, my shane is shimpo, you can call me shane though. New to this forum but have been using it on and off for years now.
I play a few rsps servers aswell as runescape, Im looking to create and run my own rsps I have a mass amount of people that would join said rsps if im too make one. These are players from other servers and real life friends that would join, also alot of people and websites to advertise, Im not so good at making rsps so if anyone wants to help me with this it would be much appericiated. there will be payment if someone can help me threw the entire process and do it well, also if they want they can co-own the server with myself and any donation rewards will be 50/50. If i own my own server i can almost be certain it will be successful ( i hope ) if anyone can help me Private message me or email me @ Shane-blue@hotmail.com
thanks all
